name: A Summation of Interest
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Charlotte, equip this card.
After Charlotte equips this card, immediately use Framing: Freezing Point Composition once.
When your Charlotte, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters uses a Normal Attack: If your opponent has a character on the field with Snappy Silhouette attached, heal your active character for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have Charlotte in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1110]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1110] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11102]</color> once.
When your $[A1110], who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters uses a Normal Attack: If your opponent has a character on the field with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111101]</color> attached, heal your active character for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1110] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

After Charlotte equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Framing: Freezing Point Composition</color> once.

(You must have Charlotte in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Charlotte to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
